DOC.brief_summary: The objective study compare effect Raisins three time per day versus alternative snack three time per day blood sugar control cardiovascular risk factor ( weight , waist circumference , blood pressure , cholesterol level ) patient Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus . These effect study 12 week period .
DOC.brief_title: Study Raisins Versus Alternative Snacks Patients With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus
DOC.detailed_description: Raisins often consider good food choice provide dietary fiber many health-promoting nutrient , antioxidant phytochemical . Like fruit , raisins devoid fat , saturate fat cholesterol , low sodium ; feature , combine high potassium content , high fiber , low glycemic index make potentially preferable food effect upon glycemic control cardiovascular risk factor .
DOC.criteria: Are generally healthy men woman old 18 year age Are willing able undergo inform consent process Have medical history Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus Have hemoglobin A1c 67.5 10 % Have body mass index ( BMI ) 25.0 39.9 kg/m2 Have blood pressure > 100 mmHg systolic > 70 mmHg diastolic Are willing able perform selfglucose monitor throughout study Are willing fast study visit Are willing able bring morning antidiabetes mellitus drug study visit Women must nonchildbearing potential define postmenopausal least 2 year surgically sterile ( i.e . bilateral tubal ligation , bilateral oophorectomy , hysterectomy ) .
